title: Rahu Transit in the 4th House for Libra Ascendant
summary: When Rahu transits the 4th house for Libra ascendant, home, emotional security, and inner stability undergo disruption and redefinition. There is restlessness regarding residence, property, or family comfort. Desire for change in living conditions increases, sometimes suddenly. Emotional peace can feel unsettled if external control is prioritized over inner grounding. This transit favors strategic property moves and modern living solutions, provided decisions are taken with patience and clarity.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Need for control over comfort rises

closing: This transit reshapes inner foundations. With patience and awareness, Rahu transforms domestic change into long-term stability.
